recipes.title: Easy Vegan Chickpea Curry
ingredients: 1 inch fresh ginger, minced or grated
1 teaspoon salt, more or less to taste
⅛ teaspoon red pepper flakes, more or less to taste
15 oz can coconut milk, full fat (400ml)
directions: Saute onions until softened, then add garlic, fresh thyme, and ginger.
Add tomatoes and break them into smaller pieces. Cook for a few minutes.
Add tomato paste and all the spices. Stir to combine.
Add coconut milk and vegetable stock. Stir until well combined.
Add chickpeas and let the mixture simmer for 20-25 minutes until it reduces and becomes creamy.
Add spinach in the last few minutes to wilt down.
Serve over rice with naan or switch up rice for quinoa. Top with red or green onions and more red flakes if desired.

recipes.title: Creamy Coconut Rice with Spiced Chickpeas
ingredients: [Detailed ingredients list available on the website]
directions: Cook coconut rice according to instructions.
Saute onions, garlic, and spices.
Add chickpeas and cook until they absorb the flavors.
Combine with coconut rice and serve.

recipes.title: Crispy BBQ Chickpeas Grain Bowl
ingredients: Grain of choice (quinoa, brown rice, etc.)
Optional toppings: avocado, red onion, cilantro
directions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss chickpeas with olive oil, BBQ sauce, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper.
Spread chickpeas on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes until crispy.
Serve chickpeas over grain and add desired toppings.

recipes.title: One Pot Easy Vegan Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: Optional: tofu or tempeh for protein
directions: Saute onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add vegetable broth, non-dairy milk, thyme, basil, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cook noodles according to package instructions.
Add tofu or tempeh if using.
Serve hot and enjoy.

recipes.title: Easy, One Bowl, Vegan Pumpkin Baked Oatmeal
directions: Combine oats, non-dairy milk, pumpkin puree, maple syrup, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt in a bowl.
Pour mixture into a baking dish and bake at 375°F (190°C) for about 25-30 minutes or until set.
Serve warm with desired toppings.

recipes.title: Chickpea, Cashew & Broccoli with Garlic Sauce Skillet
directions: Saute onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add broccoli and cook until tender.
Add chickpeas and cashews. Cook for a few minutes.
Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, ginger, and garlic sauce. Pour over the skillet and stir to combine.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.
